mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.zuoye_uuid_number as zuoyeUuidNumber ,a.zuoye_name as zuoyeName ,a.zuoye_types as zuoyeTypes ,a.banji_types as banjiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.zuoye_file as zuoyeFile ,a.zuoye_content as zuoyeContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM zuoye a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId}
and a.zuoye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeUuidNumber},'%')
and a.zuoye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeName},'%')
and a.zuoye_types = #{params.zuoyeTypes}
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.zuoye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeContent},'%')
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
